member.name: T:AspNet.Security.OAuth.LinkedIn.LinkedInAuthenticationDefaults
member.summary: Default values used by the LinkedIn authentication middleware.

member.name: F:AspNet.Security.OAuth.LinkedIn.LinkedInAuthenticationDefaults.UserInformationEndpoint
member.summary: Default value for . Note: the endpoint must follow the LinkedIn convention and contain a '~' to append fields to, if they are specified. See https://developer.linkedin.com/docs/signin-with-linkedin for more information.

member.name: T:AspNet.Security.OAuth.LinkedIn.LinkedInAuthenticationOptions
member.summary: Defines a set of options used by .

member.name: P:AspNet.Security.OAuth.LinkedIn.LinkedInAuthenticationOptions.Fields
member.summary: Gets the list of fields to retrieve from the user information endpoint. See https://developer.linkedin.com/docs/fields/basic-profile for more information.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.LinkedInAuthenticationExtensions

member.param: The to add the middleware to.
